articles.title: Trump argues proposed limits on 2020 election case evidence violate free speech
articles.description: Donald Trump's lawyers told a federal judge on Monday that strictly limiting the public release of evidence ahead of his 2020 election trial would violate his free speech rights, after prosecutors warned the former U.S. president could use that information to intimidate witnesses.
